# 1) Navigate to Your Project Directory in R
setwd("C:/Users/Pawaneet Kaur/Desktop/R/Simple Serverless Shiny Project (Shinylive)")



# app.R


library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Simple Shiny App"),
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      sliderInput("bins", "Number of bins:", 1, 50, 30)
    ),
    mainPanel(
      plotOutput("distPlot")
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  output$distPlot <- renderPlot({
    x <- faithful[, 2]
    bins <- seq(min(x), max(x), length.out = input$bins + 1)
    hist(x, breaks = bins, col = 'darkgray', border = 'white')
  })
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)



# checking stack limit 
# Cstack_info()
#options(expressions = 500000)

# 2) Test the Shiny App Locally

library(shiny)
runApp("C:/Users/Pawaneet Kaur/Desktop/R/Simple Serverless Shiny Project (Shinylive)")


# 3) Export the Shiny App Using shinylive

library(shinylive)

# Define paths
app_dir <- "C:/Users/Pawaneet Kaur/Desktop/R/Simple Serverless Shiny Project (Shinylive)"
output_dir <- "C:/Users/Pawaneet Kaur/Desktop/R/Simple Serverless Shiny Project (Shinylive)/Simple Serverless Shiny Project (Shinylive)-Static"

# Export the Shiny app to a static HTML version
shinylive::export(app_dir, output_dir)



# 4) Serve the Exported Static Files Locally

# Serve the Static Files:

library(httpuv)
httpuv::runStaticServer("C:/Users/Pawaneet Kaur/Desktop/R/Simple Serverless Shiny Project (Shinylive)/Simple Serverless Shiny Project (Shinylive)-Static")
